name: 力學（二）
description: 本課程提供物理系大學部理論力學一般的題材。
goals: 培養學生物理的歸納及推演能力
訓練學生解析的計算能力
令學生了解力學的發展歷史
使學生注意最新的發展
syllabus:
1. Wave equation (自主學習)

2.Wave propagation (自主學習)

3. Calculus of variations

4. Hamilton's principle

5. Lagrangian dynamics

6.Hamiltonian dynamics

7. Central-force motion

8. Planetary motion

9.Mid-term Exam.

10. Apsidal angles and Precession

11. Central-force motion

12. Dynamics of a system of particles

13. Scattering cross section

14. Rutherford scattering

15. Noninertial reference frame

16. Inertia tensor

17\. Euler's equations

18\. Final Exam.

grading.note: There will be one midterm exam.
There will be one final exam.
There will be in class quiz.
